# Sidechain SDK

First I installed the requirements of
- Java 8 or newer (Java 11 recommended)
- Scala 2.12.10+
- Python 2.7
- Maven

Basically I followed the same steps as in the task: [Test sidechain functionalities with Sphere by Horizen 2.0.0
](https://github.com/luisantoniocrag/test-sidechain-functionalities-with-Sphere-by-Horizen-2.0.0). 


```
[INFO] -----------------------< com.horizen:Sidechains >-----------------------
[INFO] Building Sidechains 0.2.6                                          [4/4]
[INFO] --------------------------------[ pom ]---------------------------------
[INFO] 
[INFO] --- maven-clean-plugin:2.5:clean (default-clean) @ Sidechains ---
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Reactor Summary for Sidechains 0.2.6:
[INFO] 
[INFO] io.horizen:sidechains-sdk .......................... SUCCESS [10:51 min]
[INFO] sidechains-sdk-simpleapp ........................... SUCCESS [ 45.427 s]
[INFO] sidechains-sdk-scbootstrappingtools ................ SUCCESS [ 16.951 s]
[INFO] Sidechains ......................................... SUCCESS [  0.014 s]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  12:46 min
[INFO] Finished at: 2021-01-10T23:51:10-06:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

```

and then `java -jar tools/sctool/target/sidechains-sdk-scbootstrappingtools-0.2.6.jar` to activate the bootstrapping tools.

## Generate keypairs for first Forger box in Sidechain
```
generatekey {"seed":"VqGs2tP72LrpQ6X4s9mnmchCjWf276ts"}
```
Response:
```
{
"secret":"00f3212b6df9c5cacabd8d3f64a92c42eeaccdfc45c2fddf50d3baff71c96d6cb09c31622802b4f079026bc16b13f52e51c8b5230b5d8a6346814bd8d4229fbaca",
"publicKey":"9c31622802b4f079026bc16b13f52e51c8b5230b5d8a6346814bd8d4229fbaca"
}

```

```
generateVrfKey {"seed":"uRRZdNF68jgM2uZqdWVJDdVSxS7RhBqH"}
```
Response:
```
{
"vrfSecret":"",
"vrfPublicKey":""
}
```

```
generateProofInfo {"seed":"RNsccLKjykkKu7w7yrqFtLS3kYtg6kLa", "keyCount":7, "threshold":5}
```
Response:
```
{
"threshold":5,
"genSysConstant":"1c84ce1eeb0b59d9a0acbecc3ffd8a6b9b3148ce5ec2f54556cb4bf4e1c74e61d37cb8d33e353c1f8dd5c70bae76a6362edfc08c32e12e258e973a64de324de3e9240dce5c33e4263c5f529d7fb256dbbb364826c0ad00c1d77eb6a83d120000",
"verificationKey":"",
"schnorrKeys":[{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""},{"schnorrSecret":"","schnorrPublicKey":""}]
}
```
